text.sentence: hello girls- haven't heard from either of you in a while, and was hoping y'all were ok.
was supposed to be on a flight back to houston this morning, but obvioulsy that's off now.
just got bk from france late mon night- had lots of fun, race was ok, but looooong.
triped on harry potter's cape and had to go in ambulance to emergency room to get x-rays on my arm at the finish line.
quel surpris- sustain injury to my arm while running a marathon.
just wanted to make sure you guys were alive and well and i haven't been blacklisted....
